alert.note: Alert for Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:55AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Freeborn County through 930 AM CDT... At 855 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartland, or 8 miles north of Albert Lea, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Albert Lea and Clarks Grove around 900 AM CDT. Geneva around 905 AM CDT. Hollandale and Hayward around 910 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 12 and 25. Interstate 90 between mile markers 155 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
